QUERY.TITLE: Zedillo ' s Economic Policies
QUERY.DESC: Find information on the economic_policies of Ernesto Zedillo , President of Mexico .
QUERY.NARR: Relevant documents will discuss President Ernesto Zedillo ' s economic and finance policies . Of particular interest are documents discussing the devaluation of Mexico ' s currency . Documents that only mention Zedillo as responsible_for the financial crisis in Mexico without giving details on his actions are not relevant .
